1,1.Name: Bramblesteppe Village - Blacksmith
1,1.Description: The smell of tempered metals and freshly coated leathers fill the room, the shopkeeper stands at the counter, eyeing you.

1,2.Name: Bramblesteppe Village - Adventurer's Guild
1,2.Description: All sorts of adventurers fill the room, going over contracts and forming groups to complete them with. A contract clerk stands at the counter, awaiting you to approach and request work.

2,1.Name: Bramblesteppe Village - Training Grounds
2,1.Description: All manner of training equipment stands upon the field, ready to be used. Everything here appears worn, having seen significant use.

2,2.Name: Bramblesteppe Village - Square
2,2.Description: Children run about the stalls, and rookie adventurers barter with merchants. The stalls are arranged into a square, with seating in the center.

1,1.Name: Mt. Drakkenspire - Foot
1,1.Description: A glum, craggy landscape poised beneath an ominous, looming mountain.
